00021 # define maxNumQubits   40

00031 int main (int narg, char** varg) {
00032 
00033         //
00034         // ===== INITIALISATION
00035         //
00036         
00037         // INIT ENVIRONMENT: ALWAYS REQUIRED ONCE AT BEGINNING OF PROGRAM
00038         // These two lines will automatically set up the environment (multinode,
00039         // openMP only etc)  
00040         QUESTEnv env;
00041         initQUESTEnv(&env);
00042 
00043         // model vars
00044         int numQubits;
00045         long int index;
00046         long int numAmps;
00047         
00048         // get number of qubits from command line argument
00049         if (narg >= 2) {
00050                 numQubits = atoi(varg[1]);
00051                 if (numQubits < 1 || numQubits > maxNumQubits) {
00052                         printf(" *** error: argument %d out of range (1 -- %d)\n", numQubits,maxNumQubits);
00053                         exit (EXIT_FAILURE);
00054                 }
00055         } else {
00056                 printf(" *** error: too few arguments, number of qubits expected\n");
00057                 exit (EXIT_FAILURE);
00058         }
00059 
00060         // Reporting
00061         numAmps = 1L << numQubits;
00062         if (env.rank==0){
00063                 printf("Demo of single qubit rotations.\n");
00064                 printf("Number of qubits is %d.\n", numQubits);
00065                 printf("Number of amps is %ld.\n", numAmps);
00066         }
00067 
00068         // CREATE QUBIT OBJECT: REQUIRED ONCE PER MULTIQUBIT OBJECT     
00069         // Before doing any operations on a set of qubits, create the MultiQubit object that will be used to 
00070         // represent the qubits
00071         MultiQubit multiQubit; 
00072         createMultiQubit(&multiQubit, numQubits, env);
00073 
00074         // initialise the state to |0000..0>
00075         initStateVec (&multiQubit);
00076 
00077 
00078         //
00079         // ===== ROTATIONS
00080         //
00081         
00082         double ang1,ang2,ang3;
00083         Complex alpha, beta;
00084 
00085         // define rotation angles
00086         double angles[MaxAngles][3] = {
00087                 { 1.2320,  0.4230, -0.6523},
00088                 { 2.1213,  0.0000,  3.6520},
00089                 {-3.1213,  5.0230,  0.1230},
00090                 { 5.2341, -3.1001, -1.2340},
00091                 {-0.1234, -0.9876,  4.1234}
00092         };
00093         int numAngles=5,iAngle;
00094 
00095         // rotate
00096         ang1 = angles[0][0];
00097         ang2 = angles[0][1];
00098         ang3 = angles[0][2];
00099 
00100         alpha.real = cos(ang1) * cos(ang2);
00101         alpha.imag = cos(ang1) * sin(ang2);
00102         beta.real  = sin(ang1) * cos(ang3);
00103         beta.imag  = sin(ang1) * sin(ang3);
00104         
00105         int rotQubit;
00106         for (rotQubit=0; rotQubit<numQubits; rotQubit++) {
00107                 // do rotation of each qubit
00108                 rotateQubit(multiQubit,rotQubit,alpha,beta);
00109         }
00110 
00111         // Verification: check vector size is unchanged
00112         double totalProbability;
00113         totalProbability = calcTotalProbability(multiQubit);
00114         if (env.rank==0) printf("VERIFICATION: total probability=%.14f\n", totalProbability);
00115 
00116         // report state vector to file
00117         if (REPORT_STATE){
00118                 reportState(multiQubit);
00119         }
00120 
00121 
00122         //
00123         // ===== perform a measurement
00124         //

00206         // These two lines will perform any necessary cleanup of the environment (multinode,
